channel.title: IM lost! someone help me with this error!
channel.description:
Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000000000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:31)
can someone tell me how to fix?

item.title: IM lost! someone help me with this error!
